description.plain: Louis the Child is a Chicago electronic music duo of Freddy Kennett and Robby Hauldren, prominently recognized for their hit single “It’s Strange” with K. Flay, as well as for their numerous remixes.

body.plain: Louis the Child is a Chicago electronic music duo of Freddy Kennett and Robby Hauldren, prominently recognized for their hit single “It’s Strange” with K. Flay, as well as for their numerous remixes.

songs.full_title: It's Strange by Louis The Child (Ft. K.Flay)
songs.title: It’s Strange

description.plain:
“It’s Strange” is a single collaboration between music producers Louis the Child  and singer K. Flay, released through Next Wave Records. The song presents K. Flay’s vocals backed by a simple beat, before being taken by a smooth synth and light bass arrangement.

The song blew up after being featured in the FIFA ‘16 soundtrack, and became Louis the Child’s most popular song.

Following its release as a single, Louis the Child released remix album “It’s Strange,” presenting 23 different remixes by a multitude of artists (such as SoySauce, Boombox Cartel, Whethan, etc.).

songs.embed_content: Read “It's Strange” by Louis The Child on Genius

album.full_title: FIFA 16 Soundtrack by EA Sports FIFA
album.name: FIFA 16 Soundtrack

body.plain:
“It’s Strange” is a single collaboration between music producers Louis the Child  and singer K. Flay, released through Next Wave Records. The song presents K. Flay’s vocals backed by a simple beat, before being taken by a smooth synth and light bass arrangement.

The song blew up after being featured in the FIFA ‘16 soundtrack, and became Louis the Child’s most popular song.

Following its release as a single, Louis the Child released remix album “It’s Strange,” presenting 23 different remixes by a multitude of artists (such as SoySauce, Boombox Cartel, Whethan, etc.).

songs.lyrics:
40 ContributorsIt’s Strange Lyrics[Verse 1]
Heart been so cold that I don't feel at all
Scarred up inside, so I built all these walls
My head rollin' back, but I'm fakin' the rush
Out every night and I'm lonely as fuck

[Pre-Chorus]
I make my own rules and my own plans
I got no room for no man
That's my way
That's my way
Then I saw you in a dream, right
I wanna call you, a kind of feelin'
I can't name
I can't name
[Chorus]
It's strange
But I don't need space from you
And every single thing you do, I like
I've been chased
Maybe I just knew I had to wait for you
Draw a knife and carve a little space for you
It feels nice

[Drop]
It's strange
But I don't need space from you
And every single thing you do, I like

[Verse 2]
Opened me up, I let down my defense
I swore that I wouldn't go fallin' again
I could be faded with somebody new
Rather be sober at home, just us two

[Pre-Chorus]
I make my own rules and my own plans
I got no room for no man
That's my way
That's my way
Then I saw you in a dream, right
I wanna call you, a kind of feelin'
I can't name
I can't name
You might also like[Chorus]
It's strange
But I don't need space from you
And every single thing you do, I like
I've been chased
Maybe I just knew I had to wait for you
Draw a knife and carve a little space for you
It feels nice

[Drop]
I make my own rules and my own plans
I got no room for no man
That's my way
That's my way
Then I saw you in a dream, right
I wanna call you, a kind of feelin'
I can't name
I can't name11Embed

songs.full_title: Slow Down Love by Louis The Child (Ft. Chelsea Cutler)
songs.title: Slow Down Love

description.plain: Slow Down Love is the third song in the Love Is Alive EP, which is Louis The Child’s first EP. Slow Down Love comes before Phone Died (ft. Blaise Raily), and after Fire (ft. Evalyn).
